name: Emo Through Time
description: This is a game which takes you through the emo subculture transforming your character from being a "normal" person to being an "emo". This was created for a project at school. The aim was to make a game based on a music subculture without the negativity within that subculture. At the end you recieve a code for a free drink at any shop. This is because the game was made to be played at a music event and the code does not work in real life so do not attempt to use it.
